Death Note

Death Note

Death Note (デスノート, Desu noto ? , Literally Notebook of Death ) is an ongoing Japanese manga written by Tsugumi Ohba and drawn by Takeshi Obata . It is pre-published in Weekly Shōnen Jump magazine by december 2003 at May 2006, subsequently published as twelve tankōbon sinceMay 2004 until October 2006by Shūeisha . The French version is edited by Kana dejanuary 2007 until october 2008. Following the success of the manga, a 37-episode anime adaptation was produced by Tetsurō Araki at Madhouse studio and aired from October 3 , 2006 at June 26 , 2007on Nippon Television in Japan. In France, the anime is broadcast from the February 2 , 2008on MCM anddecember 2008on Virgin 17 . Death Note is also adapted into three live films , released in Japan between 2006 and 2008, then directly on DVD in France by Kazé. A drama adaptationwas also broadcast in 2015 on Nippon TV in Japan and as a simulcast on Crunchyroll in French-speaking countries. Most recently, it was featured in a film of the same name released on Netflix in 2017.
